sentences: These meetings (25-29 March 2014, Yokohama, Japan) finalized the WGII contribution to AR5 titled 'Climate Change 2014: Impacts, Adaptation and Vulnerability'.
The Panel then met to approve the WGII SPM and accepted the underlying report, including the Technical Summary and annexes.
enb_long_title: Fortieth session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-40)
